author: matmaca
title: There should be guns instead of cages
review:
I do not get the idea of why Europe version has cages and US version has guns. The cage looks like it does not belong to the car or whatever it is. The version with guns has more function to play with it.
I throw out cage and add a storage area and some other things with some other additional parts. Now it looks better than the cage. I suggest that you should also throw out the cage and add some other things according to your imagination.

author: Alemas
title: You may think it has hundreds of features... it doesn't...
review:
Yep, the tank may look loaded with features, but it doesn't. Features: lowering staircase, mini-gun, rolling tracks and that's it! The cage is boring(even though you might want to break it apart if you imagine the T.rex escaping!), but the T.rex makes up for the cons. Hang on... on the picture they built it wrong! One of the long slopes is built too far back, blocking the entrance!

Pros:

Minifigs
T.rex has posable limbs and red eyes(when you press the button on the back of the head)
Big tank

Cons:

Not many features
Cage is boring
The "pin" holding the cage to the tank falls off a lot
The picture has building errors

Overall, not a great set.

author: andy87
title: vechicle isn't bad
review: well the t rex is amazing. He is huge and i like his colors. The treads on this sometimes have issues working on solid ground but on carpet they run fine. However, once again the tank has nothing to defend itself with and if the t rex gets away they have no way to stop it. The cage also looks quite awkward itself, dont even use it
